Northern Italy is dominated by various beautiful lakes which have become one of the favorite destinations of Europeans and many other travelers from different parts of the world. Lake Como is one of the famous lakes in Italy and also one of the deepest. This is surrounded by hills and mountains dotted with beautiful villages and villas. There are also thrilling and attractive hiking paths, water activities and boat trips. Popular ever since the Roman times, this lake is also recognized as one of the leading romantic travel destinations in the world and the perfect spot for photography sessions. 

Lake Como is truly one of the most captivating and breathtaking spots in this world. One will be amazed of the view of this large lake surrounded by spectacular mountains and coupled with exhilarating homes painted in several terra cotta hues and winding roads. This is indeed a one of a kind lake in Italy that gives you a complete vision of beautiful greenery with green lushness of flowers and trees. To sum it up, this place is exquisite. This place seems to depict magical features that will certainly lure you to visit and relax on Como Lake in Italy. 

Compelling Reasons to Visit Como Lake 
Como Lake is a perfect place to unwind, relax and slow down. This allows you to simply take in its charm and beauty as you relax in a serene setting. Aside from being an ideal place to relax, fabulous foods and shopping are also reasons to visit this terrific place. This offers low pace which is perfect if you need to reduce stress level from day to day living way back home. 

If you visit Como Lake, you get the chance to experience the following: Take boat taxi that would tour you around Como Lake and to every town. This is the best way to see this lake. Make sure not to miss the awesome lake views and the great shops and restaurants. Visit Silk Museum since Lake Como is known as Italy’s silk capital. This museum captures significant history of silk that has been told in many generation or ages. From cocoon up to the finished products, travelers and tourists like you will surely leave this place with clearer understanding about the background and history of silk. Visiting this museum is something that you should include in your itinerary. Como Lake also gives you the chance to take a closer look on the town of Como. This is indeed a great place to spend a nice morning or afternoon or simply a place to stroll. There are array of stores offering gorgeous scarves and silk ties. 

Tremezzo Town-A Famous Tourist Attraction in Como Lake that You Should Not Miss 
Tremezzo is one of the most well-known tourist attractions in Como Lake nestled on Lario’s western shore just in front of the Bellagio. This place offers stunning view of the Grigne and central basin. Since 1947, this village along with Mezzegra and Lenno has become parts if the unique commune recognized as Tremezzina. The huge and marvelous hotels and villas are what made Tremezzo a famous international tourism landmark. In Rogaro area, you will surely admire the ancient fantastic tower. This piece of land ranges from the shore lakes up to the mountainous background at the foot of Mount Crocione. This town really does have two souls, hilly and coastal and both are amazingly beautiful providing you the opportunity to select different interesting and journeys. Once you get to this town, never miss the typical Mount Crocione excursion. 

Start exploring Tremezzo by taking a walk along the Lake Como waterfront. Aside from the views of impressive and lovely gardens and villas, you will also see the awesome views across this lake towards all the hills and mountains beyond. Lovely all year round, Tremezzo offers the best diversity of gardens and villas that are worth visiting. You will never regret visiting Tremezzo town once you get to see its natural charm and picturesque views.

If you are aspiring for ultimate relaxation and wanting to pamper yourself with spa treatments, you are lucky enough because in Tremezzo, you can experience unrivalled and exclusive Espa treatments in Grand Hotel Tremezzo. The finest, most active and purest natural ingredients in the world were searched to be able to come up with effective and luxurious formulas. Every ingredient use is carefully harvested, meticulously prepared and sustainably sourced for ultimate effectiveness. Nothing artificial is added on the formulation just natural and pure ingredients. 

Espa treatments are specifically customized to your present and exact needs whether for simple relaxation or for complete escapism from stressful and busy world. These have their own souls with special rituals inspired by the ancient cultures and modern treatments carried out by highly-experienced and trained therapists focusing on stress relief and optimizing age defying and health results. 

In Grand Hotel Tremezzo, you can get complete spa treatments by ESPA and inclusive skincare collection. You will find these treatments to be effective, relaxing and therapeutic. You will also be offered with collection of exclusive wellness experiences such as Lake Como relaxing ritual, grand detox and more which take about 110 minutes. You can also take advantage of the following treatments only at Grand Hotel Tremezzo: Essential Facials such as skin radiance, re-dehydrator, de-sensitizer, express facial, skin purifying facial and more. Massages like aromatherapy massage which lasts for about 50 or 80 minutes, Swedish massage for 50 or 80 minutes also, deep muscle massage and maternity massage both for the same time duration, salt and oil scrub and the list goes on. If you wanted to explore and enjoy the town of Tremezzo and experience exclusive Espa treatments in Grand Hotel Tremezzo, Como Lake Italy is definitely the perfect place to be. Relax in Como Lake and experience the best in life. ...
